name: Christmas Terror
description:
This was a game I made over 2 years ago which explains why it isn't that good. I accidentally deleted it a while back and have decided to add it back to the selection of bad games I have created. Your job is to find and click on the correct present which is disguised as a bomb. You will have to use the weird janky controls to find the bomb before it blows up and kills everyone... blood... death... and all that jazz.

(please ignore bad spelling mistakes and terribly boring level design.)
